list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the perceptible natural movement of the air, especially in the form of a current of air blowing from a particular direction.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the wind howled about the building

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: breath as needed in physical exertion or in speech.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he waited while Jez got his wind back
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh đợi trong khi Jez trở lại gió

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: wind instruments, or specifically woodwind instruments, forming a band or a section of an orchestra.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: these passages are most suitable for wind alone
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Những đoạn này phù hợp nhất cho gió một mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a twist or turn in a course.
a single turn made when winding.
cause (someone) to have difficulty breathing because of exertion or a blow to the stomach.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: mùa thu gần như cuộn anh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: detect the presence of (a person or animal) by scent.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the birds could not have seen us or winded us
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Những con chim không thể nhìn thấy chúng ta hoặc uốn lượn chúng ta

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: sound (a bugle or call) by blowing.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: but scarce again his horn he wound
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: nhưng khan hiếm một lần nữa sừng anh ta bị thương

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: move in or take a twisting or spiral course.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the path wound among olive trees
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Con đường bị thương giữa những cây ô liu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: pass (something) around a thing or person so as to encircle or enfold.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he wound a towel around his midriff
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ta quấn một chiếc khăn quanh midriff của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make (a clock or other device, typically one operated by clockwork) operate by turning a key or handle.
